title: IOCTL_HID_GET_DEVICE_ATTRIBUTES (hidport.h)
description: The IOCTL_HID_GET_DEVICE_ATTRIBUTES request obtains a HIDClass device's attributes in a HID_DEVICE_ATTRIBUTES structure.
